pages.title: Kamen Rider Jyamato Gazer
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats: Final Stage (2023, stage show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/vision_driver#vision_driver_jyamato_glare)Vision Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed IV$(li)Resistance III$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste IV$(li)Slow Falling IV$(li)Jump Boost VI
